pr.title: Create Pull Request
pr.description: Push branch and create a pull request for "{{taskTitle}}"

errors.unknown: An unknown error occurred while creating the pull request
errors.invalidBranchName: Branch name contains invalid characters. Use only letters, numbers, hyphens (-), underscores (_), and forward slashes (/).
errors.emptyTitle: Pull request title cannot be empty.

success.alreadyExists: A pull request already exists for this branch

hints.targetBranch: Leave empty to use the default branch
hints.prTitle: Leave empty to use the task title

discard.title: Discard Build
discard.confirmTitle: Are you sure you want to discard all changes for "{{taskTitle}}"?
discard.warning: This will permanently delete the isolated workspace and all uncommitted changes. The task will be moved back to Planning status.
